items.label: Excluded Values
items.formula: Set denominator = 0 and solve. Example: $\frac{1}{x-3}$ is undefined when $x = 3$

items.label: Key Rule
items.formula: A rational expression is UNDEFINED when the denominator equals zero

items.label: Constant Denominator
items.formula: If denominator is a non-zero constant, expression is defined for all real numbers

items.label: Simplification Rule
items.formula: Factor numerator and denominator, then cancel common factors: $\frac{ac}{bc} = \frac{a}{b}$ where $c \neq 0$

items.label: Cannot Cancel
items.formula: Can only cancel FACTORS, not terms. Cannot cancel in $\frac{x+2}{x}$ or $\frac{x^2+1}{x}$

items.label: Sign Changes
items.formula: $\frac{a-b}{b-a} = -1$ (opposites in numerator/denominator cancel to -1)

items.label: Multiplication
items.formula: $\frac{a}{b} \cdot \frac{c}{d} = \frac{ac}{bd}$ - Multiply across, then simplify

items.label: Division
items.formula: $\frac{a}{b} \div \frac{c}{d} = \frac{a}{b} \cdot \frac{d}{c}$ - Multiply by reciprocal

items.label: Strategy
items.formula: Factor FIRST, then multiply/divide and cancel common factors

items.label: Same Denominator
items.formula: $\frac{a}{c} + \frac{b}{c} = \frac{a+b}{c}$ and $\frac{a}{c} - \frac{b}{c} = \frac{a-b}{c}$

items.label: Find LCD
items.formula: Factor all denominators, LCD = product of all unique factors with highest powers

items.label: Rewrite with LCD
items.formula: Multiply each fraction by missing factors to get LCD in all denominators

items.label: Combine
items.formula: Once denominators match, add/subtract numerators only

items.label: Recognizing Opposites
items.formula: $(a-b)$ and $(b-a)$ are opposites: $(a-b) = -(b-a)$

items.label: Handling Opposites
items.formula: $\frac{x}{a-b} + \frac{y}{b-a} = \frac{x}{a-b} - \frac{y}{a-b}$ (factor out -1 from denominator)

items.label: Key Tip
items.formula: Change sign of numerator when flipping denominator from $(b-a)$ to $(a-b)$

items.label: Step 1: Find LCD
items.formula: Identify LCD of all denominators in the equation

items.label: Step 2: Multiply Through
items.formula: Multiply EVERY term by LCD to clear all fractions

items.label: Step 3: Solve
items.formula: Solve the resulting polynomial equation (usually linear or quadratic)

items.label: Step 4: CHECK!
items.formula: Verify solution doesn't make any original denominator = 0 (extraneous solutions)

items.label: Extraneous Solutions
items.formula: Solutions that make denominators zero must be REJECTED

items.label: Don't Cancel Terms
items.formula: Only cancel common FACTORS, not addends: $\frac{x+3}{x} \neq \frac{3}{1}$ âœ—

items.label: Don't Forget to Check
items.formula: Always check solutions in original equation (excluded values)

items.label: Watch Minus Signs
items.formula: When subtracting fractions, distribute the minus: $\frac{a}{c} - \frac{b+d}{c} = \frac{a-b-d}{c}$
